name: bot_changed
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community An bot user was changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 											 The bot_changed event is sent to all connections for a team when an integration "bot" is updated. Clients can use this to update their local list of bots. If the bot belongs to a Slack app, the event will also include an app_id pointing to its parent app.
